name: Coruscate
description:
"The sun glitters off the trail just beyond the north ridge, coating the world in a gentle golden light that makes you want to keep following the sunbeam." - Sykcolo / AI

Coruscate by @Sykcoloart

Taking something that most would consider ugly or repulsive and showing it in a different way that transforms it into something uniquely beautiful is the main passion behind this project that I called Metamorphoses.

This artwork is created using generative techniques to mutate and deconstruct a micrograph of glue glitter from a discarded toy. 

Learn about the inspiration, story and techniques behind this project on my website: https://www.sykcolo.com/blog-1/the-metamorphoses-collection

https://linktr.ee/sykcolo

4000 × 4000 px

7 Editions

December 2021
